Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.model.player

Class PlayArea

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.model.player.PlayArea
public class PlayArea extends Object
This class represents the play area of a player in the game. It manages the player's placed cards and achieved resources.

  • Method Details

    • placeStarter

      public void placeStarter(PlayableCard card)
      Places the starter card at (0,0) and updates the achieved resources.
      Parameters:
      card - the starter card to place.

    • place

      public int place(PlayableCard card, Point point) throws IllegalPlaceCardException
      Firstly it checks out if I have enough Resources to play the card. Then it adds the card in the placedCard Map if the function allowedMove return true. Then return the value of points gained from that card Notice that player will have to call: score += hisPlayArea.place(card, point) to add points at his score correctly
      Parameters:
      card - the card to place.
      point - the point to place the card at.
      Returns:
      the score gained from the card.
      Throws:
      IllegalPlaceCardException

    • getPlacedCards

      public LinkedHashMap<Point,PlayableCard> getPlacedCards()
      Returns:
      a copy of the placed cards.

    • getAchievedResources

      public Map<Resources,Integer> getAchievedResources()
      Returns:
      a copy of the achieved resources.
